name: RNF Technologies
overview:
RNF Technologies is an IT services and product company founded in 2009, by former Google & AOL employees, and is headquartered in Bangalore, India with sales office in New York.

Domain: Our expertise lies in delivering,

 Website solutions - E-commerce, SEO, SEM, Informational sites.  Mobile Solutions - iPhone/Android Development  Business solutions - Create, offer and develop solutions to solve business challenges.  Custom solutions - Custom solutions to meet the specifications and expectations.  Offshore staffing - Have our talented and experienced team, work full time for client’s projects.

Clientele: We have satisfied clients ranging from small businesses to Fortune 100 companies across the globe.

Our Key Advantages :

 Innovation.  Best quality at most affordable price.  Prioritize customer satisfaction over everything else.

offices.address1: S-1, 2nd Floor, #89, A M Plaza, Airport Road,
